bigshot

Class ImagePyramidParameters

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.util.AbstractMap<K,V>
      • java.util.TreeMap<String,String>
        • bigshot.ImagePyramidParameters
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable, Cloneable, Map<String,String>, NavigableMap<String,String>, SortedMap<String,String>

    public class ImagePyramidParameters
extends TreeMap<String,String>
    A typesafe interface to the parameters for MakeImagePyramid.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  ImagePyramidParameters.DescriptorFormat
      The descriptor format for the output pyramid.
      static class  ImagePyramidParameters.FolderLayout
      The folder structure of the output pyramid.
      static class  ImagePyramidParameters.Format
      The output format for the image pyramid.
      static class  ImagePyramidParameters.ImageFormat
      Image format for the tiles and everything.
      static class  ImagePyramidParameters.LevelNumbering
      If set to "invert", inverts the level numbering.
      static class  ImagePyramidParameters.Preset
      A preset set of parameters.
      static class  ImagePyramidParameters.Transform
      The input image transform

      • Nested classes/interfaces inherited from class java.util.AbstractMap

        AbstractMap.SimpleEntry<K,V>, AbstractMap.SimpleImmutableEntry<K,V>

        public ImagePyramidParameters levels(Integer levels)
